		                    Choroid Melanoma
		                    Treatment of small choroid melanoma may include the following:         -  Watchful waiting.    -  Plaque radiation therapy.    -  Charged-particle external-beam radiation therapy.    -  Gamma Knife therapy.    -  Thermotherapy.    -  Surgery (resection or enucleation).
